title: (x) Sans on pharmaceutical packaging - Ocean Sans {Stephen}
content:
This is probably an easy one, and I should know it, but at the moment I just can't identify this sans. Any help is much appreciated!   
   
 ![pharmaceutical box](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010211658im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69966.jpg)
author: capthaddock

comments.content: Thanks! I don't usually have that one activated.
Or perhaps generated an instance from the old [Multiple Master version](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010211658/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=242837).

Someone either stretched [Ocean Sans Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010211658/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.108941.0.4&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Continuous+Release&sampleSize=48) or   
squished [Ocean Sans Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010211658/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.103179.5.11&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Continuous+Release&sampleSize=48).
